DataElement.preferredName: Biospecimen Gifts and Donations Purpose Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that indicates the type of use for which the biospecimen was donated.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.:A funding source comprising money received through outside gifts or donations._What something is used for; reason or intention.
